Amazing Curriculum grounded in Education & Faith

The child care center is licensed by the state of Ohio Job and Family Services. Our curriculum includes Kindergarten readiness, language, music, art, science, gross motor and fine motor activities. Christian concepts about God and the Bible are taught on a daily basis with a practical application of Christian principles. Lunches are provided for children aged one year and older. Infant formula and/or food will be provided for babies or parents may provide their own. The child care center provides a nutritional morning and afternoon snack.
